description.value: Guidelines for conveying coverage requirements to clinicians when planning treatment

name.value: CRD Device Request On Behalf Of - STU3

description.value: Custom CRD STU3 search parameter allowing search for device requests based on the organization on whose behalf the order was placed - allows use of _include to retrieve the organization when querying a device request
